successes.title: KUNG FURY
successes.description:
Kung Fury is a visually spectacular action comedy that
has its foundation in 80s cop movies. Available now at kungfury.com, YouTube, and iTunes!

Pledges.description: This is cool, why not? Easy way to brag on the street  ”I was one of the funders of this super mega movie.”

Welcome to the club! You'll recieve access to the production diary and follow the production of the film. As well as tips, techniques and tutorials on how to create certain visual effects. Plus you'll recieve a digital copy of the official Kung Fury Theme by Mitch Murder.
Digital copy of the script + thank you video from director with exclusive behind the scenes material. (Includes all previous rewards)
Sneak peak at the final result. Get an exclusive sneak peak at the film before everyone else! (Includes all previous rewards)
You'll recieve a digital download of Kung Fury in full HD 1080p resolution, with kickstarter-backer exclusive extra features not available to the public. (Includes all previous rewards)
UPDATE INFO: PLEASE NOTE! All contributions from $20 and above includes the digital download, sneak peak and access to the production diary (the $5 $10 $15 pledge).
Region-free Blu-Ray of Kung Fury, with extra features, behind the scenes featurettes and directors commentary.
If you prefer a DVD before Blu-ray, we can’t stop you! Support the project for $30 and get a retro DVD as well!
Get an awesome kickstarter-backer exclusive Kung Fury t-shirt.

Decorate your home with the official Kung Fury poster. We will put a lot of effort into creating the most awesome artwork for this poster. Remember all those amazingly illustrated 80s movie posters? It'll be just like that only awesome'er.

Blu-Ray & t-shirt COMBO
Simple as that!

DVD & t-shirt COMBO
Simple as that!

Kung Fury poster + Blu-ray COMBOPACK - Signed by the Director. 
Increase your street cred by a Kung Fury poster in your living room, signed by the director himself. Or why not a region-free Blu-Ray - also signed of course and packed with extra features!

Be a part of an advance film screening of Kung Fury in Umeå, Sweden . You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Umeå.
---
You will also recieve a copy of the soundtrack by Mitch Murder and Lost Years.
Get a signed copy of the script, a copy of the soundtrack by Mitch Murder and Lost Years and kickstarter-exclusive Kung Fury stickers.
Get a special edition VHS copy of the film! Who could believe buying a new VHS in the year 2014? For 100 dollars? That’s so insane your friends will walk away from you! (and steal the VHS).
T-shirt + Poster Combo !
Kung Fury poster + Blu-ray + T-shirt COMBOPACK - Signed by the Director. Be the coolest kid on the block with this one of a kind trio combo pack explosion!
DVD + Kung Fury poster + T-shirt COMBOPACK - Signed by the Director. Simple as that!

Increase your street cred by getting your name or nickname in the movie! This can be in form of graffiti writing on a wall in the background, a document or on a street sign. Your name will be a permanet part of movie history. Note that we will not include anything offensive.
Time to get personal. Get a 20 second video where Kung Fury will say whatever you want. You name it! Nothing too offensive though.

Missed the $200 name tier? Have your picture used in the film instead! Maybe a photo of you turns up in Hitlers wallet or at the desk of the police officer station? The picture must be on a face (not a commercial logo) and may be modified to suite the situation.

Get the chance to hang out with the cast and crew at a private advance screening of Kung Fury in Stockholm, Sweden! We'll have a drink, talk about the universe and watch the movie together, it'll be awesome! --- You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Stockholm.

Since this film relies heavily on post production, we will have tons of digital sets and props from the film. In other words, 3d models made just for Kung Fury. Robots, Dinosaurs, Arcade Machines etc. You'll recieve one of these props in the proper format. (Under Creative Commons NC license)

We will create a stunt puppet 3d model of Kung Fury for use in the most intense action sequences. Performing out-of-this-world stunts. You'll recieve this exclusive, extremely detailed and realistic 3d model, rigged and ready for action. (Under Creative Commons NC license)
Have your name appear in the official credits roll as a "Backer".

Be an extra in the film! How about fleeing from a Arcade Machine Robot on a lazer shooting spree in downtown Miami - or a Nazi Soldier fighting Kung Fury - or a Police Officer in 1980s Miami - or how about a Street Thug? There's so many possibilities! You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation.
You will officially be credited as an associate producer of Kung Fury.

SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY
Be credited as ” SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY” in the credit roll. 
Includes signed Blu-Ray, poster and t-shirt!
Get your face on the silver screen! You will get to play a character in the movie and we will write a line just for you! You will provide your own travel and accommodation.

One of a kind Kung Fury action figure made just for you.
+ Signed Blu-Ray - poster - tshirt !
Thors hammer and helmet. Wear the same helmet as Thor did in the movie while you swing away with the mighty hammer Mjölnir. Made specifically for Kung Fury and only one made ever.
You will officially be a Co-Producer of Kung Fury. Your name will appear on posters, covers, credit-rolls and other cool places.

Play a major role in the movie as Kung Fury's ex partner. Your name will appear on posters, covers, credit-rolls and other cool places. We will provide your travel and accommodation for the shoot and the official premiere.
